sentence: Mr. SCHUMER. Now, on Mr. Bove--Emil Bove--last week, Senate  Republicans on the Judiciary reported out one of Donald Trump's worst  judicial nominees yet, Emil Bove; and that is saying a lot, since there…

…Honduras was  facilitating the sale of narcotics in America, we thought so much of  the effort to prosecute him that we assigned an assistant U.S. attorney  by the name of Emil Bove. Ring a bell? Emil Bove was chosen by  President Trump to serve on the circuit court of the United States. He  was approved by this Chamber. I was at the hearing where he was…

…with a number of colleagues  on probably one of the most important decisions we are going to make  with respect to the future of justice in America: the nomination of  Emil Bove to be a judge on the court of appeals for the Third Circuit,  the second highest panel in our judiciary.

And he is about as unfit and unqualified as any judicial nominee to…

The PRESIDING OFFICER (Mr. Curtis). The clerk will report the  nomination.

The legislative clerk read the nomination of Emil J. Bove III, of  Pennsylvania, to be United States Circuit Judge for the Third Circuit.
